prompt: Create a modern product details page with a clean white background and a centered layout. At the top, display a large product icon (use Icons.headphones) in a circular container with a light gray background. Below, show the product title 'Premium Wireless Headphones' in bold black text. Include a 4.5-star rating with yellow stars and gray unfilled stars, followed by '(128 reviews)' in gray text. Display the price '299.99' in large green text with a crossed-out original price '399.99' in smaller gray text. Add a detailed description section with multiple paragraphs about noise cancellation, battery life, and comfort, in gray text. Include a quantity selector with minus and plus buttons around a number display. End with a full-width blue 'Add to Cart' button. Use a scrollable Column layout, modern typography, and generous spacing for a clean look.
